site_name: Plots S1, S11 and S10, International Quarter London (IQL) South, land adjacent to Westfield Avenue, Zone 2 Stratford City, London
description: Observation requested by London Legacy Development Corporation for formal requested for an Environmental Impact Assessment (EIA) Scoping Opinion under Regulation 15 of the Town & Country Planning (Evironmental Impact Assessement) (England and Wales) Regulations 2017 (as amended) in respect of a mixed-use development comprising of a scheme for up to 560 residential units (48,100 square metres) (GEA) and associated car parking, cycle parking and health and wellbeing centre and creche (Use Class D1) (1,600 square metres (GEA) (the 'S1 and S 11 Scheme') and a scheme for a commerical office building (Class B1) (circa 44,845 square metres) (GEA) with retail (Class A1 A2, A3, A4, A5) (circa 980 sq.m GEA) and Alternative uses (including D2 uses) (circa 1,175 sq.m) ('the S10 Scheme'). The development will provide tall buildings with full details submitted for the S1 and S11 scheme and outline details for the S10 scheme. Both schemes will deliver public realm, landdscaping and infrastructure.
